name: Menger Sponge Penrose Tribar 27.05.2020
description:
This is the Menger Sponge Penrose Tribar, by the artist Tiago Hands, United Kingdom.

Tiago currently has 4,560 Youtube subscribers and 38,700 organic followers on his Instagram mathematics proofs page.

Isometric constructs like this don't come about each day.

It's a matter of inspiration and insight.

Here Tiago manages to combine the fractal geometry of the Menger sponge with the mischievious wizardy of the Penrose triangle.

Somehow, it just works.
